      • build_modular_coefficients

        public static Expr build_modular_coefficients(Expr u,
                                              Expr v,
                                              Int p,
                                              Int q,
                                              Expr[] L)
        Builds coefficients using Chinese remainder algorithm coefficient by coefficient
        Parameters:
        u - - a polynomial in Z[L]
        v - - a polynomial in Z[l]
        p - - an integer such that gcd(p, q) = 1
        q - - an integer such that gcd(p, q) = 1
        L - - a list of variables
        Returns:
        the polynomial A such that A mod p = u and A mod q = v

      • integer_chinese_remainder_garner

        public static Expr integer_chinese_remainder_garner(Expr[] U,
                                                    Int[] M)
        Builds coefficients using Chinese remainder algorithm on whole polynomial
        Parameters:
        U - - a list of polynomials with coefficients in Z
        M - - a list of integers
        Returns:
        the polynomial A such that A mod M[i] = U[i]
